item.description:
The Dark Knight opens on July 18. Friday evening works for some of us, so we'll schedule a late-evening show then. The movie starts at 9:50 PM. Let's try to meet around 9:30. Everyone buys their own tickets. Since this is a big summer blockbuster on opening night, you might want to get your tickets in advance.

We'll meet at Westboro this time, instead of Blackstone 14 or Showcase in Worcester. That's the Regal Cinema (formerly Hoyt's) behind Uno's at the intersection of 135 and Route 9.

*** Special thanks to Ken, for looking up the showtime and the length of the film (it's 2 1/2 hours long). Thanks Ken. ***
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have glasses, a goatee, and a Superman cap.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: The Dark Knight at 9:30 in Westboro
